General.Name: Shinhsiung Natural Gas
General.Description: ShinHsiung Natural Gas Inc. supplies natural gas in Taiwan. It operates through Gas Sale Department, Installation Department, and Solar Electricity Sale Department segments. The company engages in the gas transmission conduits and equipment business; sale of electricity generated by solar energy; equity holding activities; buying, selling, and renting of real estate; and real estate development, lease, and sale business. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
